<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data.replace(/(\r\n)|(\n)|(\r)/g,''))
</js>result

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
var set = JSON.parse(source.getVariable());
var list = java.getElements(".p-r-5.p-l-5.p-b-15");
var $ = aaa => String(list[i].select(aaa)[0x0].text());
var shunt = ["?shunt=1", "?shunt=2", "?shunt=3"];
var data = [];
for (i = 0x0; i < list.length; i++) {
    name = $(".m-t-5.title-truncate.video-title");
    var authors = [];
    var titleTruncateElements = list[i].select(".title-truncate a");
    for (var j in titleTruncateElements) {
        if (!titleTruncateElements[j].hasClass("tag")) {
            authors.push(String(titleTruncateElements[j].text()));
        }
    }
    author = authors.join('/').replace(/(&| & | \|,|\s)/g, '/').replace(/\/+/g, '/');
    var kinds = [];
    var kindElements = list[i].select(".title-truncate a");
    for (var j in kindElements) {
        if (kindElements[j].hasClass("tag")) {
            kinds.push(String(kindElements[j].text()));
        }
    }
    kind = kinds.join(',').replace(/\s/g, '');
    kind = '♥ ' + list[i].select(".text-white").text() + ',' + $(".category-icon").replace(/[ ]/g, ',') + ',' + kind.replace($(".category-icon") + ',', '').replace(/,+/g, ',').replace(/,已/g, ',').replace(/中,/g, ',');
    kind = String(kind).replace(/^(.{36}).*/, '$1');
    img = list[i].select(".img-responsive.lazy_img");
    cover = img.attr("src").includes("blank.jpg") ? img.attr("data-original") : img.attr("src");
    var TempList = {};
    TempList.name = name;
    TempList.author = author;
    TempList.kind = kind;
    TempList.word = '';
    TempList.latest = '';
    TempList.intro = '';
    TempList.cover = cover;
    TempList.url = set.url + list[i].select(".thumb-overlay-albums a").attr("href") + shunt[set['p'] - 0x1];
    data.push(TempList);
}
data = JSON.stringify(data);
put(data);
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
var set = JSON.parse(source.getVariable());

(function (skey) {
    var array = ["/?shunt=1", "/?shunt=2", "/?shunt=3"];

    if (set.search_TC == true || skey.indexOf("TC") > -1) {
        skey = zhTransform(skey, "traditional").replace(/TC/, '');
    }
    return set.url + "/search/photos" + array[set.p - 1] + "&search_query=" + skey + "&main_tag=0&page={{page}}";
})(key);
</js>

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
if (/comic/.test(baseUrl)) {
  result = result.match(/comics\:.*,pages/)[0];
  result = result.match(/\[\{(.*)\}\]/)[0];
}

var pattern1 = /japanese:\"(.*?)\"\,/g;
var pattern2 = /media_id:\"(.*?)\"/g;
var pattern3 = /japanese:\"|(\",)/g;
var pattern4 = /media_id:\"|(\")/g;
var coverheader = 'https://h-comic.com/api/nh/';
var urlheader = 'https://h-comic.com/comics/';
list = [];
var match1;
var match2;
var match3;
var match4;
var cover;

while ((match1 = pattern1.exec(result)) !== null) {
  match2 = pattern2.exec(result);
  match3 = match1[0].replace(pattern3, '');
  match4 = match2[0].replace(pattern4, '');
  cover = coverheader + match4;
  href = urlheader + match3;
  list.push({ 'name': match3, 'cover': cover, 'url': href });
  //list.push(match[0]);
}
list
</js>

bookSourceComment: 增加自动验证，不行就手动登录，登录url要与源url一致。 解决目前新的字体格式文字显示的问题(例替换显示为'的')。 by812@221012 解决目前所见到的所有问题，包括页面解析、分页有的页面获取不到、图片转文字等问题，并对内容中出现的翻页断行、以前流行的35字换行排版、部分内容显示HTML源码、推广文字、广告等进行了恢复与过滤。 效果自认为是不错的，就是慢，巨慢，分页多的章节可能获取文字就要几分钟，毕竟，要做过滤和处理。 凑合用吧兄弟们，后续暂时不准备修改了。 地址发布页(浏览器打开) https://zozozo.xyz/ http://www.diyibanzhu666.xyz 目前可用地址： https://www.3yydstxt426.com/ https://www.7yydstxt226.com/ https://www.7yydstxt434.com/ https://www.8yydstxt234.com/ https://6yydstxt178.com/ 获取最新可用网址 大家可以根据自己的网络情况选一个最快的来用 替换👉源域名👈链接即可 注意版主一系各站点数据库并非完全同步，所以换了地址之后原有的小说如果追更就需要重新搜索。 建议用复制出来源换个名称再批量改源的方式来做。

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));

var getbook = java.getElements(".common-comic-item");

var booklist = [];

for (i = 0; i < getbook.length; i++) {
  name = getbook[i].select(".comic__title").text();
  kind = String(getbook[i].select(".comic-count").text()).replace(/人气：/g, "✦ ");
  latest = getbook[i].select(".comic-update a").text();
  intro = getbook[i].select(".comic-feature").text();

  if (TC_to_SC == "true") {
    for (x in i) {
      name = ti(name, i[x], z[x]);
    }

    for (x in i) {
      author = ti(author, i[x], z[x]);
    }

    for (x in i) {
      kind = ti(kind, i[x], z[x]);
    }

    for (x in i) {
      latest = ti(latest, i[x], z[x]);
    }

    for (x in i) {
      intro = ti(intro, i[x], z[x]);
    }
  }

  var bookdata = {
    "name": name,
    "author": ''
  };
  bookdata.kind = kind;
  bookdata.word = '';
  bookdata.latest = latest;
  bookdata.intro = intro;
  bookdata.cover = getbook[i].select(".cover img").attr("data-original");
  bookdata.url = getbook[i].select("a").attr("href");

  booklist.push(bookdata);
}

booklist = TC_to_SC == true ? zhTransform(JSON.stringify(booklist), "simplified") : JSON.stringify(booklist);

JSON.parse(booklist);</js>

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
if (/study/.test(baseUrl)) {
  result = result.match(/\[\{.*\}\]/)[0];
}
JSON.parse(result)
var pattern1 = /\$oid\":\"(.*?)\"/g;       //提取书籍id
var pattern2 = /vod_pic\":\"https:\\\/\\\/img\.go2099\.com\\\/comichanman\\\/(.*?)\\\/thumb\.jpg\"/g;     //提取书籍封面
var pattern3 = /vod_name\":\"(.*?)\"/g;    //提取书籍名称

var pattern4 = /\$oid\":\"|(\")/g;       //剔除提取书籍id
var pattern5 = /vod_pic\":\"https:\\\/\\\/img\.go2099\.com\\\/comichanman\\\/|(\\\/thumb\.jpg\")/g;     //剔除提取书籍封面
var pattern6 = /vod_name\":\"|(\")/g;    //剔除提取书籍名称

//https://ios.gougou901.top/content/?id=654db1ccca166ebadae8cb5e&dname=comic&catid=20

var urlstart = 'https://jsonv8.study2026.com//json-api/?dname=comichanman&id=';
//var urlend = '&dname=comic&catid=20';
var coverstart = 'https://img.go2099.com/comichanman/';
var coverend = '/thumb.jpg';

list = [];
var match1;
var match2;
var match3;
var bookname;
var cover;
var bookid;
var bookurl;

while ((match1 = pattern1.exec(result)) !== null) {
  match2 = pattern2.exec(result);
  match3 = pattern3.exec(result);
  bookname = match3[0].replace(pattern6, '');
  bookname = eval("'" + bookname + "'");
  // bookname = java.strToBytes(bookname);
  // bookname = java.unicodeBytesToString(bookname);
  cover = match2[0].replace(pattern5, '');
  bookid = match1[0].replace(pattern4, '');
  bookurl = urlstart + bookid;
  cover = coverstart + cover + coverend;
  list.push({ 'name': bookname, 'cover': cover, 'url': bookurl });
  //list.push(match[0]);
}
list
</js>

	20230724 更新验证码获取逻辑，获取一次正确的验证码后，一段时间内无需再次获取-尐哖
  20230723 修改发现为动态获取-尐哖
	可以手动切换
	改变源URL地址(sourceURL)，网站就会切换
	下面套娃网站(m和www通用)
	希望中文：https://m.5xw.net
	123读书：https://m.123du.vip
	滨州书站：https://m.binzhousz.com
	偶然中文：https://m.or7.net
	趣七屋：https://m.qu7.net
	博趣中文：https://m.1bqg.net
	洪都中文：https://m.nchdzx.com
	我来读：https://m.wolaido.com
	益生原文学：https://m.cnyxfs.com
	齐齐读：https://m.qiqidu.net
  博看：https://m.bokank.com
  二品中文：https://m.2pzw.com
*/
try{
	c2=result.match(/c2="(.*?)"/)[1]
	u2=result.match(/src="(.*?)"/)[1]
	origin=baseUrl.match(/[^.]+[^/]+/)[0]
	str=java.ajax(origin+u2).match(/function.*\(\)\}/)[0]
	eval(str);temp=ajax(c2)
	java.ajax(origin+temp)
 if(baseUrl.match(/sscc/)){
 	u=java.get("url")}else{u=baseUrl}
 	//java.log(u)
	result=java.ajax(u)
}catch(err){result}

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment))
try{
	actyzm=result.match(/actyzm" value="([^"]+)"/)[1];
	button=result.match(/button" value="([^"]+)"/)[1];	
	url=java.get("url");
	code=String(url).replace(/\/sscc.*/,'')+"/member/getcode.asp";
	yzco=source.getVariable();
	function getOption(str,co){
  	hed={"Referer":url,"Cookie":co}
  	return JSON.stringify({"method":"POST",
"charset":"gb2312","body":"actyzm="+actyzm+"&yzm="+str+"&button="+button,"headers":hed});
  }
  function succes(){
		yzm=java.getVerificationCode(code);
		url+=","+getOption(yzm,"");
		hm=java.ajax(url);
		co=java.getCookie(url,"g3jy9sqo0ws");
   source.setVariable(yzm+',g3jy9sqo0ws='+co)
   return hm;
  }
	if(yzco&&yzco!=''){
		v=String(yzco).split(',');
		u=url+","+getOption(v[0],v[1]);
		result=java.ajax(u);
		if(/请输入验证码/.test(result)){
			java.longToast("  ！验证码过期或有误，重新获取  ！")
			result=succes();
		}
	}else{result=succes("");}
result
}catch(err){java.log(err);result}
</js>
.B

var getlist = java.getElements(".Drama.autoHeight li");

    title = getlist[i].select("span").text();
    order = title.match(/(\d+)/);
    title = settle == true ? String(title).replace(/\s-\s|-/g, " ").replace(/\s+/, " ").replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章](|\s)第.*?[话話章]/, "$1").replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章][^\s]/, "$1 ").replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章]\s\d+/, "$1").replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章]/, "$1").replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, "0") : "$1") : title;
    title = TC_to_SC == true ? zhTransform(JSON.stringify(title), "simplified") : JSON.stringify(title);
    title = JSON.parse(title);
    var templist = {};
    templist.title = i == 0 ? title + "〔" + date + "〕" : title;
    templist.link = host + getlist[i].select("a").attr("href");

    chapterlist.push(templist);
}

function main() {
    return chapterlist;
}

main();</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));

var getlist = java.getElements(".detail-list-1 li a");

var chapterlist = [];
date = String(java.getElements(".detail-list-title-3").text()).replace(/第第/g, '').replace(/\s/g, "-");

for (i in getlist) {
    title = getlist[i].text();
    order = title.match(/(\d+)/);
    title = settle == true ? String(title).replace(/\s-\s|-/g, " ").replace(/\s+/, " ").replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章](|\s)第.*?[话話章]/, "$1").replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章][^\s]/, "$1 ").replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章]\s\d+/, "$1").replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章]/, "$1").replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, "0") : "$1") : title;
    title = TC_to_SC == true ? zhTransform(JSON.stringify(title), "simplified") : JSON.stringify(title);
    title = JSON.parse(title);
    var templist = {};
    templist.title = i == getlist.length - 1 ? title + "〔" + date + "〕" : title;
    templist.link = host + getlist[i].attr("href");

    chapterlist.push(templist);
}
function main() {
    return chapterlist;
}
main();
</js>

<js>
let id = result.match(/\{siteid:'(\d+)',bid:'(\d+)',cid:'(\d+)'\}/);
if (id) {
    let body = "siteid=" + id[1] + "&bid=" + id[2] + "&cid=" + id[3];
    let path = "novelsearch/chapter/transcode.html,";
    let option = {
        "method": "POST",
        "body": String(body)
    };
    java.ajax(String(source.bookSourceUrl + path + JSON.stringify(option)))
}
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("1701019k").getBytes(),"DES");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AQIDBAUGBwg="));
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
String(decrypt(JSON.parse(result).DATA.CTXT)).replace(/{{title}}/,'')
</js>

    bookname = JSON.parse('"' + bookname + '"');
    // bookname = java.strToBytes(bookname);
    // bookname = java.unicodeBytesToString(bookname);
    cover = match2[0].replace(pattern5, '');
    bookid = match1[0].replace(pattern4, '');
    bookurl = urlstart + bookid;
    cover = coverstart + cover + coverend;
    list.push({ 'name': bookname, 'cover': cover, 'url': bookurl });
    //list.push(match[0]);
}
list
</js>

<js>
Date.prototype.Format = function (fmt) {
  var o= {
    "M+": this.getMonth() + 1, //月份 
    "d+": this.getDate(), //日 
    "H+": this.getHours(), //小时 
    "m+": this.getMinutes(), //分 
    "s+": this.getSeconds(), //秒 
    "q+": Math.floor((this.getMonth() + 3) / 3), //季度 
    "S": this.getMilliseconds() //毫秒 
  };
  if (/(y+)/.test(fmt)) fmt = fmt.replace(RegExp.$1, (this.getFullYear() + "").substr(4 - RegExp.$1.length));
  for (var k in o)
  if (new RegExp("(" + k + ")").test(fmt)) fmt = fmt.replace(RegExp.$1, (RegExp.$1.length == 1) ? (o[k]) : (("00" + o[k]).substr(("" + o[k]).length)));
  return fmt;
};
date = new Date(new Date().getTime()).Format("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss");

for (i in list) {

    time: list[i].addTime,
    ImgUrl: list[i].ImgUrl
  });
};

{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content}} 
<js>result.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')</js>
<js>
result.replace(/^(\d+)、第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+\s/,'$1 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)(、|. ?)/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)*/,'$1 $2$3')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
.replace(/第0+/,'第')
</js>

//md5加密开始
var rotateLeft = function(lValue, iShiftBits) {
    return (lValue << iShiftBits) | (lValue >>> (32 - iShiftBits))
}
var addUnsigned = function(lX, lY) {
    var lX4, lY4, lX8, lY8, lResult;
    lX8 = (lX & 0x80000000);
    lY8 = (lY & 0x80000000);
    lX4 = (lX & 0x40000000);
    lY4 = (lY & 0x40000000);
    lResult = (lX & 0x3FFFFFFF) + (lY & 0x3FFFFFFF);
    if (lX4 & lY4) return (lResult ^ 0x80000000 ^ lX8 ^ lY8);
    if (lX4 | lY4) {
        if (lResult & 0x40000000) return (lResult ^ 0xC0000000 ^ lX8 ^ lY8);
        else return (lResult ^ 0x40000000 ^ lX8 ^ lY8)
    } else {
        return (lResult ^ lX8 ^ lY8)
    }
}
var F = function(x, y, z) {
    return (x & y) | ((~x) & z)
}
var G = function(x, y, z) {
    return (x & z) | (y & (~z))
}
var H = function(x, y, z) {
    return (x ^ y ^ z)
}
var I = function(x, y, z) {
    return (y ^ (x | (~z)))
}
var FF = function(a, b, c, d, x, s, ac) {
    a = addUnsigned(a, addUnsigned(addUnsigned(F(b, c, d), x), ac));
    return addUnsigned(rotateLeft(a, s), b)
};
var GG = function(a, b, c, d, x, s, ac) {
    a = addUnsigned(a, addUnsigned(addUnsigned(G(b, c, d), x), ac));
    return addUnsigned(rotateLeft(a, s), b)
};
var HH = function(a, b, c, d, x, s, ac) {
    a = addUnsigned(a, addUnsigned(addUnsigned(H(b, c, d), x), ac));
    return addUnsigned(rotateLeft(a, s), b)
};
var II = function(a, b, c, d, x, s, ac) {
    a = addUnsigned(a, addUnsigned(addUnsigned(I(b, c, d), x), ac));
    return addUnsigned(rotateLeft(a, s), b)
};
var convertToWordArray = function(string) {
    var lWordCount;
    var lMessageLength = string.length;
    var lNumberOfWordsTempOne = lMessageLength + 8;
    var lNumberOfWordsTempTwo = (lNumberOfWordsTempOne - (lNumberOfWordsTempOne % 64)) / 64;
    var lNumberOfWords = (lNumberOfWordsTempTwo + 1) * 16;
    var lWordArray = Array(lNumberOfWords - 1);
    var lBytePosition = 0;
    var lByteCount = 0;
    while (lByteCount < lMessageLength) {
        lWordCount = (lByteCount - (lByteCount % 4)) / 4;
        lBytePosition = (lByteCount % 4) * 8;
        lWordArray[lWordCount] = (lWordArray[lWordCount] | (string.charCodeAt(lByteCount) << lBytePosition));
        lByteCount++
    }
    lWordCount = (lByteCount - (lByteCount % 4)) / 4;
    lBytePosition = (lByteCount % 4) * 8;
    lWordArray[lWordCount] = lWordArray[lWordCount] | (0x80 << lBytePosition);
    lWordArray[lNumberOfWords - 2] = lMessageLength << 3;
    lWordArray[lNumberOfWords - 1] = lMessageLength >>> 29;
    return lWordArray
};
var wordToHex = function(lValue) {
    var WordToHexValue = "",
    WordToHexValueTemp = "",
    lByte, lCount;
    for (lCount = 0; lCount <= 3; lCount++) {
        lByte = (lValue >>> (lCount * 8)) & 255;
        WordToHexValueTemp = "0" + lByte.toString(16);
        WordToHexValue = WordToHexValue + WordToHexValueTemp.substr(WordToHexValueTemp.length - 2, 2)
    }
    return WordToHexValue
};
var uTF8Encode = function(string) {
    string = string.replace(/\x0d\x0a/g, "\x0a");
    var output = "";
    for (var n = 0; n < string.length; n++) {
        var c = string.charCodeAt(n);
        if (c < 128) {
            output += String.fromCharCode(c)
        } else if ((c > 127) && (c < 2048)) {
            output += String.fromCharCode((c >> 6) | 192);
            output += String.fromCharCode((c & 63) | 128)
        } else {
            output += String.fromCharCode((c >> 12) | 224);
            output += String.fromCharCode(((c >> 6) & 63) | 128);
            output += String.fromCharCode((c & 63) | 128)
        }
    }
    return output;
};
function md5(string) {
    var x = Array();
    var k, AA, BB, CC, DD, a, b, c, d;
    var S11 = 7,
    S12 = 12,
    S13 = 17,
    S14 = 22;
    var S21 = 5,
    S22 = 9,
    S23 = 14,
    S24 = 20;

    S33 = 16,
    S34 = 23;

    S43 = 15,

    b = 0xEFCDAB89;
    c = 0x98BADCFE;

        c = FF(c, d, a, b, x[k + 6], S13, 0xA8304613);
        b = FF(b, c, d, a, x[k + 7], S14, 0xFD469501);

        b = FF(b, c, d, a, x[k + 15], S14, 0x49B40821);

        b = GG(b, c, d, a, x[k + 8], S24, 0x455A14ED);

        d = GG(d, a, b, c, x[k + 2], S22, 0xFCEFA3F8);
        c = GG(c, d, a, b, x[k + 7], S23, 0x676F02D9);
        b = GG(b, c, d, a, x[k + 12], S24, 0x8D2A4C8A);

CryptoJS.mode.ECB = (function() {
    var ECB = CryptoJS.lib.BlockCipherMode.extend();

    ECB.Encryptor = ECB.extend({
        processBlock: function(words, offset) {
            this._cipher.encryptBlock(words, offset);
        }
    });

    ECB.Decryptor = ECB.extend({
        processBlock: function(words, offset) {
            this._cipher.decryptBlock(words, offset);
        }
    });

    return ECB;
} ());

function encryptByDES(message, key) {
    var keyHex = CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.parse(key);
    var encrypted = CryptoJS.DES.encrypt(message, keyHex, {
        mode: CryptoJS.mode.ECB,
        padding: CryptoJS.pad.Pkcs7
    });
    return encrypted.toString()
}
//DES加密结束
var deskey = 'web@hzlq';
var userId='0';
function getPostUrl(data,type) {
var url = 'http://m.ndlib.cn/nlc_read_home/service.do,';
var md5Key = 'library_2016@hzlq';
value = {
    siteId: 1,
    data:encryptByDES(JSON.stringify(data), deskey),
    userId: userId,
    fromSource: 3,
    osType: 5,
    version: "1.0.1",
    versionCode: 10001,
    timeStamp: data.timeStamp,
    hashCode: md5(data.timeStamp + md5Key)
}
var option={
"method":"POST",
"body":'cmd='+type+'&value=' + encodeURIComponent(JSON.stringify(value))
}
return url + JSON.stringify(option);
}
//搜索链接
var data ={
    timeStamp:Date.now(),
    bigType:"0",
    content:key,
    pageSize:10,
    pageNum:1
};
getPostUrl(data,'qrySearchList')

ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>
pages=java.get('page');
page=parseInt(pages/50);
url=String(java.get('url'));
list=[];
if(page>6){
page=6
}else{page=page}
for(i=1;i<=page;i++){
list.push(url.replace(/offset=\d+/,'offset='+(parseInt(i)*50)))
}
list
</js>

function sign(list){
    var sb='2bb6ffe20b1eff00';
    list=list.sort();
    for(var i=0;i<list.length;i++){if(i==0){sb+=list[i];}else{sb+="&";sb+=list[i];}}
    sb+="cabf8a3adca20e831d7e96267f709032";
    return String(java.md5Encode(sb)).toUpperCase();
}

Date.prototype.Format = function (fmt) {
  var o= {
    "M+": this.getMonth() + 1, //月份 
    "d+": this.getDate(), //日 
    "H+": this.getHours(), //小时 
    "m+": this.getMinutes(), //分 
    "s+": this.getSeconds(), //秒 
    "q+": Math.floor((this.getMonth() + 3) / 3), //季度 
    "S": this.getMilliseconds() //毫秒 
  };
  if (/(y+)/.test(fmt)) fmt = fmt.replace(RegExp.$1, (this.getFullYear() + "").substr(4 - RegExp.$1.length));
  for (var k in o)
  if (new RegExp("(" + k + ")").test(fmt)) fmt = fmt.replace(RegExp.$1, (RegExp.$1.length == 1) ? (o[k]) : (("00" + o[k]).substr(("" + o[k]).length)));
  return fmt;
};
date = new Date(new Date().getTime()).Format("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss");
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
var list = java.getElements(".detail-list-1 li a"),
  data = [];
for (i in list) {
  data.push({
    title:
      i == list.length - 1 ? `${list[i].text()}〔${date}〕` : list[i].text(),
    link: list[i].attr("href")
  });
};
1 == flag
  ? (java.put("Enable", 1), JSON.stringify(data))
  : java.toast("\n❗未启用书源❗");
</js>

<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, ''),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + o('#intro').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|章节目录|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + ' • ' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|分享书籍.*|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

key=java.get('key');
page=java.get('page');

json=[];json2=[];

//判定json里是否有列表
if(JSON.parse(result).info.Datas){
json=JSON.parse(result).info.Datas;}

//加载单曲搜索页面并转为json
json1=JSON.parse(java.ajax('https://www.missevan.com/sound/getsearch?s='+key+'&type=3&page_size=10&p='+page));

//判定json里是否有列表
if(json1.info.Datas){
json2=json1.info.Datas
}

//剧集搜索列表与单曲搜索列表拼接
list=json.concat(json2);

result=JSON.stringify(list)
</js>
$.[*]
